thread.title: The heartbreaking last words of schoolboy killed in crash | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: The heartbreaking last words of schoolboy killed in crash | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: The heartbreaking last words of schoolboy killed in crash | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
The heartbreaking last words of schoolboy killed in crash 7th Nov 2017 12:15 PM Use this content by Andrew Koubaridis 
A FATHER who helped lift a car off a boy after its fatal crash into a primary school has described the heartbreaking moment. 
The man, who lives nearby, said he ran to the school after hearing a loud bang, and helped three tradies move the Toyota 4WD off an unconscious child while another pulled the boy out from underneath. 
As he did so, he could hear another injured boy lying nearby calling for his mother. 
"He was saying 'I want my mum'," the man, whose daughter attends the school, told the Daily Telegraph . "She wouldn't have got to see him before he died. 
"He had a big gash in his head." 
Two boys, both aged eight, died following the crash and three girls were badly injured. 
Witnesses who rushed to the scene after hearing the commotion told the ABC there was blood and debris everywhere and children screaming and crying. It took four men to lift the Toyota Kluger off an unconscious boy at Banksia Primary School in Greenacre. Picture: Hollie Adams/The Australian 
Students told of the panic after out-of-control Toyota Kluger ploughed into a classroom. Tarik, a student in 3T, the classroom at Banksia Road Public School in Greenacre in Sydney's southwest that was hit by the car said: "The car crashed into the room … I saw one of my friends faint … I started crying. It sounded like a big pop". 
Two young boys, both aged 8, were declared dead when they arrived at The Children's Hospital at Westmead. Two eight-year-old girls were transported to the same hospital in a stable condition, and one nine-year-old girl was also taken there in a serious condition. A man breaks down after hearing two children died at a school in Greenacre, in Sydney’s west. 
Student Remas Shebhavalvem, 9, who is in Year 4, was visibly upset when she came out of the school. She was told her friend in Year 3 had a broken leg. 
"I heard a bang in the classroom and we thought it was nothing. But then the teachers came and screamed at us to leave everything," she told News Corp Australia's Canterbury-Bankstown Express. 
The car smashed straight through the classroom. Picture: AAP 
She said she was "super scared" especially when she noticed one of her friends hadn't emerged from the ruined classroom. 
Isaac Tayba, who rushed to the school where his nephew is a Year 3 student, said it was a tragedy to see what happened. 
"It was a difficult moment, we all left our jobs and rushed here," Mr Tayba said. 
"You've got mothers over there fainting, you've got paramedics dealing with all the mothers and everyone is just nervous that it's their child." 
"Apparently I think she (the driver) drove in there and instead of maybe pressing the brake, she might have hit the accelerator." 
Police from Bankstown Local Area Command and Metropolitan Crash Investigation Unit are investigating and have established a crime scene. 
The female driver, 52, was uninjured but has been taken to hospital for routine blood and urine tests. Students leaving with their parents from Banksia Road Primary School in Greenacre. 
The school is notifying parents to pick their children up. Police are asking parents who are collecting their children to attend the Boronia Rd school entrance. 
A tradie called Paul was one of three tradesmen who helped lift the front of the Toyota off one of the injured children. They then performed CPR. 
"It wasn't just me, there were a lot of people here helping this morning," he said. 
Khaled Arnaourt told Fairfax what he saw when he was one of the first to arrive at the scene. 
"I heard a loud bang but I didn't take much notice of it. I was just about to hop into the car to get going and then I heard kids screaming. My daughter goes to that school. I ran across the road there was a big hole in the building. Teachers and everyone were just running around. There was blood and kids on the floor, just lying down and screaming." 
Many local parents took to Facebook to beg for answers as they rushed to the scene. One distressed mother said she hadn't heard from her child and feared the worst. 
Another parent tried to calm her. 
"My husband is there if the parents have not been called it means that their child is ok, the parents or the children being affected has been notified, please don't stress,' she posted. 
One woman summed up the mood of many in the community: "Imagine sending your kids to school not knowing they'll never come back. How heartbreaking. I can't imagine what the parents must be going through." 
Police and paramedics at the scene in Greenacre. Related Items

thread.title: Samsung brutally mocks Apple over iPhone X | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: Samsung brutally mocks Apple over iPhone X | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Samsung brutally mocks Apple over iPhone X | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Samsung brutally mocks Apple over iPhone X 7th Nov 2017 5:42 AM | Updated: 7:30 AM Use this content by Ally Foster 
With all the hype surrounding the release of the new iPhone X, Samsung has brought out a video advertisement in which they savagely mock Apple and its customers. 
The ad is called "Samsung Galaxy: Growing Up" and shows a young man buying his first iPhone in 2007 and calling his friend to tell him. 
A series of clips then play showing the man upgrading to different iPhone models over the years and being repeatedly disappointed by them. 
The video shows him trying to take a photograph only to be told there is not enough storage on the phone, along with having to use the iPhone's headphone adaptor to charge the phone and listen to music at the same time. 
The man eventually gets rid of his iPhone in favour of a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 and is shown giving people lining up for the new iPhone X pitiful looks. 
People are upset about Coke's new ad 
Forget Kendall Jenner's Pepsi ad, there is a new controversial soda that people are upset about. 
Coca-Cola's new ad is making waves on social media and not in a good way. 
Early this month Coke released a new commercial in Saudi Arabia, which shows a young female driver in a hijab being taught how to drive by her father. 
The ad was meant to celebrate the country's decision to allow women and some people praised the company for their support, but others thought the commercial was in bad taste. 
"Coca-cola: Saudi women driving edition. Brands jump at the chance to make a profit off #Saudi's historic announcement," one Twitter user wrote. 
According to Coca-Cola, the one-minute long ad titled "Change has a taste," is meant to enable the "economic empowerment of women." 

— Muna AbuSulayman منى (@abusulayman) November 4, 2017 
Drugs tests for parents at risk of losing their children 
A new program that is being introduced in spots across NSW that have high rates if child abuse will see parents that are at risk of having their children removed undergo drug testing. 
The program is set to target around 100 families a year and will see parents asked to partake in drug tests, with experts available 24 hours a day for crisis calls. 
This is the first time drug testing has been part of a targeted community welfare program in NSW, with the aim to reduce the number of children entering state care. 
Some of the parts of state that will be targeted by the program include Coffs Harbour, Dubbo, Tamworth and Wyong. A post shared by R.A.I.N.A. (@oohraina) on Apr 10, 2017 at 4:04pm PDT 
App tells you when Macca's ice cream machine is broken 
We all know the pain you feel when you are craving a McFlurry so you jump in the car and make a special trip to McDonald's only to discover that the ice cream machine is broken, again. 
But, there is a way to make sure that you never experience this kind of heartbreak again and it is all thanks to a new app. 
The app, called Ice Check, allows you to search a nearby McDonald's and find out ahead of time if their ice cream machine isn't working. 
Users are able to change the fast food stop's status to 'on' or 'off', whether the machine is working or not and if it is the location's icon will turn pink, or if it is not it will be grey. 
Citizenship crisis continues 
Another MP has had their citizenship status questioned, with Liberal backbencher John Alexander making enquires to determine whether he also holds British citizenship. 
This revelation came just hours after Malcolm Turnbull announced a new citizenship plan, which would force every MP to declare their citizenship status and birth details of their parents and provide proof that any dual citizenship they had was renounced. 
If it is confirmed that Mr Alexander holds dual citizenship then it would force another by-election, which could see the Turnbull government lose the majority. 
Fairfax Media revealed that there was no indication that Mr Alexander's father, Gilbert Alexander who died in 1987, renounced his UK citizenship before his son was born. The latest revelation in the citizenship saga could spell trouble for Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull. Picture Gary Ramage Related Items

posts.title: Boston udolal Atlantu a vyhrál v NBA podeváté za sebou
posts.text:
Boston udolal Atlantu a vyhrál v NBA podeváté za sebou Dnes 07:57 - New York 
Nejlepší tým NBA Boston prodloužil vítěznou sérii o devátý zápas. V pondělí Celtics porazili těsně 110:107 domácí Atlantu, která se nachází na opačném konci tabulky Východní konference. Lepšící se Hawks po nedělní výhře v Clevelandu málem zaskočili i dalšího favorita, poté co v poslední čtvrtině smazali dvoucifernou ztrátu. John Bazemore , ČTK/AP 
Koncovku ale zvládli lépe Celtics, jejichž lídrem byl rozehrávač Kyrie Irving s 35 body a sedmi asistencemi. Skvělý zápas proti svému bývalému zaměstnavateli odehrál i Al Horford, jenž dal 15 bodů, doskočil 10 míčů a o jednu asistenci mu unikl triple double. Nejlepším střelcem Hawks byl Dennis Schröder s 23 body. 
Basketbalisté Miami jako první v sezoně dokázali udržet mistrovské Golden State Warriors pod hranicí sta nastřílených bodů. Favorizovaní domácí přesto zvítězili 97:80. Kevin Durant proměnil všech deset trestných hodů a s 21 body byl nejlepším střelcem vítězů, na stejný počet se dostal v týmu soupeře James Johnson. Výsledky NBA:

posts.title: Peugeot 5008 thế hệ mới sẽ về Việt Nam, giá dưới 1,5 tỷ đồng
posts.text:
07/11/2017 Peugeot 5008 thế hệ mới sẽ về Việt Nam, giá dưới 1,5 tỷ đồng Các showroom Peugeot vừa thông báo nhận giao dịch mẫu xe Peugeot 5008 thế hệ mới. Dự kiến những chiếc xe đầu tiên của mẫu SUV 7 chỗ châu Âu sẽ đến tay khách hàng từ giữa tháng 12/2017. 
Tổng thống Pháp đi xe “độc” trong Lễ Quốc khánh 
Là một trong những model xe áp dụng triết lý thiết kế mới New i-Cockpit, 5008 là mẫu xe rất thành công của Peugeot trong việc chinh phục khách hàng phân khúc SUV, đặc biệt tại thị trường châu Âu. 
Tại Việt Nam, phân khúc SUV 7 chỗ châu Âu vẫn còn là một thị trường đầy tiềm năng. Đa số các mẫu xe châu Âu trong phân khúc này như Audi Q7, Range Rover Discovery, Mercedes GLS… đều có tầm giá trên 3 tỷ đồng, khá cao so với nhu cầu của đa số khách hàng. Việc đưa mẫu xe 5008 về thị trường Việt Nam cùng với việc định giá tạm tính ở mức dưới 1,5 tỷ đồng thể hiện rõ tham vọng của Peugeot 
Việc đưa mẫu xe 5008 về thị trường Việt Nam cùng với việc định giá tạm tính ở mức dưới 1,5 tỷ đồng thể hiện khá rõ tham vọng của Peugeot trong việc chinh phục thị trường xe SUV 7 chỗ châu Âu tại thị trường Việt Nam. Với mức giá này, dự kiến Peugeot 5008 sẽ chinh phục thành công đa số khách hàng có nhu cầu xe SUV 7 chỗ cao cấp đang lựa chọn xe ở tầm giá từ 1-1,5 tỷ. 
Tại thị trường châu Âu, Peugeot 5008 trang bị động cơ 1.6L Turbo, số tự động 6 cấp, chức năng Grid Control cho phép tùy chỉnh chế độ vận hành trên đường cao tốc, đường phủ tuyết, cát, sỏi đá giúp xe vận hành tương tự xe dẫn động 2 cầu. 
Ngoại thất xe thiết kế theo ngôn ngữ New i-Cockpit hiện đại, hệ thống đèn trước lẫn đèn sau Full-LED, điều chỉnh góc tự động; cửa sổ trời toàn cảnh panorama. 
Nội thất xe thiết kế mô phỏng khoang lái máy bay với hàng loạt các trang bị đậm tính công nghệ số như màn hình hiển thị trên bảng táp-lô 100% digital, màn hình điều khiển trung tâm cảm ứng 8 inches, cần số điện tử, phanh tay điện tử, hệ thống âm thanh Focal 10 loa, hệ thống điều hòa tự động lọc mùi/tạp chất, đèn nội thất điều chỉnh theo chế độ lái, gạt mưa tự động, ghế chỉnh điện kèm chức năng sưởi và massage đa điểm, cảm biến mở cốp tự động… Nội thất xe thiết kế mô phỏng khoang lái máy bay với hàng loạt các trang bị đậm tính công nghệ số 
Các trang bị an toàn gồm hệ thống ABS, phân bổ lực thắng điện tử EBFD, phanh khẩn cấp EBA, cân bằng ESP, chống trượt ASR, 6 túi khí, hệ thống ga tự động và giới hạn tốc độ, hỗ trợ khởi hành ngang dốc, hỗ trợ xuống dốc, cảnh báo điểm mù, cảnh báo áp suất lốp, hệ thống cảm biến hỗ trợ đỗ xe, camera lùi 180%, cảnh báo chệch làn đường, hệ thống nhận diện và cảnh báo biển báo giới hạn tốc độ, khóa ISO Fix cho ghế trẻ em... Peugeot 5008 sẽ đến tay khách hàng Việt từ giữa tháng 12/2017 
Cấu hình xe Peugeot 5008 thế hệ mới tại Việt Nam chưa được tiết lộ, tuy nhiên, theo các thông tin từ showroom cho thấy các tính năng trang bị không khác nhiều so với các phiên bản châu Âu. Hiện các Showroom Peugeot đang bắt đầu nhận giao dịch với 4 màu cơ bản: Trắng (Pearl White), Đen (Nera Black), Xám (Platimum Grey) và Xanh ngọc (Emeral Crystal).

thread.title: Hey I'm new to this group!
thread.title_full: Hey I'm new to this group! - BabyCenter

posts.author: RedwoodPrincess
posts.text:
Hi! We're due date buddies I guess. Don't worry, by 9 weeks our chances of bringing home a healthy baby are excellent, especially if you've seen a good heartbeat.
But seriously, age is not some magic determining factor of if you'll miscarry. Between conception and around 7 or 8 weeks the chances of miscarriage are shockingly high for all age groups. I never thought I would miscarry at 19 years old. I was very healthy with no family history of loss. I miscarried again at 23. I'm 26 now and everything looks good so far.
I've had two healthy, happy sons during that time too. All I can say is welcome to motherhood. Your child will never be 100% safe and you will worry for the rest of your life.

thread.title_full: BEPPE MAROTTA UNGKAP ALASAN SEBENARNYA LEONARDO BONUCCI DILEPAS KE AC MILAN

posts.author: Tiko Bau (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: BEPPE MAROTTA UNGKAP ALASAN SEBENARNYA LEONARDO BONUCCI DILEPAS KE AC MILAN
posts.text:
Bandar88 - GM Juventus Beppe Marotta mengungkapkan alasan sebenarnya kenapa klub merelakan Leonardo Bonucci merapat ke AC Milan pada bursa transfer musim panas lalu.

Keputusan sang defender itu memang mengundang perdebatan. Banyak pihak yang terkejut dengan langkah Bonucci dan berbagai spekulasi menyeruak mengenai pilihan yang dibuat sang pemain.

Kini, Marotta membeberkan hal yang sebenarnya terjadi ketika Bonucci pindah ke San Siro.

"Bonucci adalah pemain top," buka Marotta kepada Domenica Sportiva.

"Tentu saja ini menjadi transisi yang sulit baginya, namun saya kira Anda harus mengevaluasi rekan-rekannya juga. Sepakbola adalah permainan tim. Permainan individual bisa menambahkan mutu tapi saya kira permainan kolektif jauh lebih penting."

"Di Juventus kami berharap mereka bisa menjadi kompetitif, lalu kami berusaha mengalahkan lawan."

"Kenapa kami menjual Bonucci? Karena kami tahu betul jika beragam pilihan sebetulnya dibuat oleh pemain itu sendiri, jadi mereka adalah arsitek dari takdir mereka sendiri."

"Bonucci membuat keputusan dan Juventus tidak menahannya, dia memang berhasrat untuk meninggalkan klub. Itu bukan berarti hubungan memburuk. Bonucci adalah pemain hebat, namun dia membuat pilihan ini, mungkin dalam rangka meningkatkan kemampuannya dan mendapat rangsangan baru."

"Setiap transfer kebanyakan karena kemauan sang pemain. Jadi dia memutuskan. Jelas jika klub bisa ikut campur terhadapnya, tapi ketika itu keinginan saya untuk lebih baik membiarkan dia pergi" tandas Marotta.

대형화면을 볼 수 있게 도와 줄 것입니다.
HI-V120 과 EB-1960 전동노출120인치스크린에 PPT 화면을 투사한 사진입니다.
전체 조명을 점등하고 투사도 해보고 부분적으로 소등하고 투사도 해 보았습니다.
 채광이 조금 들어오는 상황이지만
두 화면 다 밝고 선명하게 투사가 되었습니다.
교육이나 회의에 제일 많이사용 되는 PPT 입니다.
저해상도의 경우 작은 글자의 경우 뭉개지는 현상이 발생이 되어 보기 불편할 수도 있습니다.
글자 크기 비교 EB-1960은 XGA해상도로 10포인트의 글자까지도 선명하게 투사가 가능하답니다.
이젠 교육이나 회의시 대형화면으로 진행이 더욱 고급스러워 질것입니다.
이미지 투사 사진 이미지 사진을 투사해 보았습니다.
조금 기다렸더니 블라인드 설치가 완료 되었내요~^^
LCD프로젝터 답게 부드러운 색감표현이 되었습니다.
친절한 상담과 좋은 제품 추천 그리고 안전하고 깔끔한 설치까지
아이티솔루션에서 진행하셨습니다.
아래 번호로 전화주시면
단 한통의 전화로 모든 것을 처리할 수 있는 아이티솔루션입니다!!

thread.title: Om pengagömmare
thread.title_full: Om pengagömmare

posts.author: Bert Bodin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Om pengagömmare
posts.text:
Leif Östling. Uppvuxen här i Luleå. Fyra år äldre än jag.  

Jo. Honom minns man ju ... 
Nej, faktiskt inte. Visste inte ens om det förrän jag i något sammanhang såg företagsnamnet Hertsoe  och anade samband. Östling är i och för sig inget ovanlig namn här, men inte så att jag reagerade direkt på det.Och en av våra största stadsdelar heter Hertsön. 

För mig får folk gärna tjäna pengar, bara det inte sker på andras olycka och bekostnad. Det där att "gömma" slantar i utlandet i så kallade skatteparadis, förstår jag mig inte alls på. Det ger automatiskt en känsla av skumraskaffärer oavsett om de är lagliga eller inte. 

Sedan kan man ju undra vad de ska göra med alla pengarna. Spara för framtida generationer släktingar, som kan leva bekymmerslöst utan att göra ett skapandes grand? Eller bli korkade presidenter i t.ex. USA?

posts.title: Australia - Data Analytics, M2M, Cyber Crime and Data Centres
posts.text: Australia - Data Analytics, M2M, Cyber Crime and Data Centres Press release from: MarketResearchReports.biz "The Report Australia - Data Analytics, M2M, Cyber Crime and Data Centres provides information on pricing, market analysis, shares, forecast, and company profiles for key industry participants. - MarketResearchReports.biz"Global Cloud Specialists are Driving Growth in the Australian Data Centre MarketData Centres BuddeComm has been supportive of the data centre market since the 1990s. However, it took nearly 20 years for the industry to reach its current position. The arrival of cloud computing, Big Data, M2M and IoT allowed for a large range of new services and applications, especially aimed at small and medium organisations.The data centre market includes telehousing facilities, co-location facilities, cloud and IT services, content hosting, connectivity and interconnection. They are important for a range of business and government applications including new developments of cloud computing and the Internet of Things (M2M).These developments have given an enormous boost to the data centre market, with investments totalling $5 billion over the 2011-2016 period. Investment in datacentres in Australia is still very strong, driven by the large number of global and local cloud specialist providers entering the local market, particularly the global providers Microsoft, Amazon and CenturyLink. Currently the developments are highly centralised in the capital cities, but a more decentralised trend is expected to develop over time.Data centre customers are migrating from co-location services and managed hosting to cloud services. Cloud providers are the fastest growing segment of most Australian data centre providers. Government continues to increase in maturity in their understanding of cloud technologies, how to use cloud to the best of their advantage, and how to optimize their existing infrastructure. Get Sample Copy Of This Report @ www.marketresearchreports.biz/sample/sample/768027 Data Analytics BuddeComm describes big data as looking at intelligent outcomes that can be achieved from data collaboration. The most critical issue here is strategic management, rather than technology. However the fact that big data has become a vital tool in competition is forcing many companies to transform their organisations from a company-centric approach to a customer-centric one.The fact that this development is being driven by data-rich organisations such as Google, Apple, Amazon, Facebook, eBay and many others operating in the digital economy is an indication that data management is a critical factor here. In other words, if you dont have your companys data systems and structures organised in a customer-centric way you wont be able to deliver a good customer experience.Connected information management, however, can go much further. There are many other players involved in the broader ecosystem, and by sharing and combining relevant data sets and then analysing those large data sets we can find new correlations that can be used to spot business trends, assess customer behaviour, prevent diseases, combat crime and so on. Obviously this needs to be done on a permission-based or opt-in basis, but if the customer sees the value of it they can become involved. Nevertheless privacy is an issue that requires close scrutiny.M2M With the NBN and LTE now well and truly underway it is important to look at what will be the value of this new infrastructure to the development of a network that will be dominated by sensors and devices. The infrastructure that is now being built offers a range of features such as ubiquitousness, affordability, low latency, high speed and high capacity. It will link millions of devices, such as sensors, that will enable us to manage our environment, traffic, infrastructures, and our society as a whole much more efficiently and effectively.The Internet of Things (referring more to personal devices such as wearables and smartphones) and M2M (referring to a more industrial use based on sensors) are going to be real game-changers. They will transform every single sector of society and the economy and it will be out of this environment that new businesses and indeed new industries will be born. LTE and later on 5G will take a leadership role in the development of M2M but the NBN is also a key infrastructure element as more and more applications will require high quality video. These developments are closely linked to big data, data analytics, cloud computing and data centres and these elements all play a fundamental role in the success of this new infrastructure.View Report @ www.marketresearchreports.biz/reports/768027/australia-da... The number of connected M2M devices in Australia will grow to somewhere between 25 million and 50 million by 2020.Cyber Crime With the internet having become a critical national and international infrastructure a whole range of privacy issues have come to the fore in relation to the digital economy and the digital society. Some of these issues are in relation to national and international security and tens of billions are spent by governments using the internet as a surveillance tool. This has led to a frenzy of activity by governments to, on the one hand, protect their sovereignty and, on the other, use the internet for their own security activities. Separate to this are the commercial issues. With internet services becoming pervasive it can be argued, rightly or wrongly, that there are some services that people simply have to have. This is exploited by the companies involved, with requests for a range of highly private data in exchange for the free use of these applications and services.Another issue relates to the free flow of information over the internet. In countries with little infrastructure- based competition there is a threat that these providers will use commercial arrangements to favour some over the rest. This is known as the net neutrality issue and, while this issue is mainly of concern to the USA, other countries are also keeping a close eye on possible monopolistic misuse.Send An Enquiry Request @ www.marketresearchreports.biz/sample/enquiry/768027 On top of that is the issue of international governance of the internet and its basic infrastructure. However, with widely diverging interests from countries such as China, Russia, Iran, North Korea on one side and Europe and North America on the other, there is a long way to go before any consensus can be reached, if ever. posts.author: BDNewsTV24Hours (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: অক্ষম পুরুষকে সক্ষম করতে তেঁতুল ! জেনে নিন সঠিক ভাবে খাওয়ার নিয়ম
posts.text:
তেঁতুল খেলে রক্ত পানি হয়ে যায় এমন ধারণা অনেকে করেন তবে সেটা ভুল। এটা ছেলেদের ও উপকার করে মেয়েদেরও করে
তবে কোন এক অজানা কারণে এটা অন্য প্রানী যেমন ষাঁড়ের যৌন ক্ষমতা কমাতে এটা ব্যাবহৃত হয়।
তবে গবেষনায় দেখা যায় তেঁতুল পুরুষ মানুষের যৌন ক্ষমতা আরো বৃদ্ধি করে। আর মেয়েদের জন্যও এটা অনেক কাজের কারন এতে রয়েছে প্রচুর ভিটামিন ‘সি’ যা তাদের দেহের ক্ষত পুরনে সাহায্য করে আর মেয়েদের শরীরে বেশী ক্ষত হয়।
আর প্রেগনেন্সির সময় এটা খেলে মুখের রুচি ফিরে নিয়ে আসে ফলে মায়ের স্বাস্থ্য ঠিক থাকে। রক্তের চর্বি কমানোর মাধ্যমে মায়ের ও বাচ্চার রক্তচলাচল ঠিক রাখে।
তেঁতুল একটা উপকারী ফল। এটার অনেক পুষ্টিগুন রয়েছে। ছেলেদের নিষেধ আর মেয়েদের খেতে হবে বিষয়টা এমন নয় বরং এতে রয়েছে অনেক পুষ্টিউপাদান যেমন,
জলীয় অংশ (গ্রাম) ২০.৯

posts.text: В порноактрисе узнали героиню статьи об успешной девушке-инженере из Белоруссии Пользователи сети узнали в модели вебкам-чата некую Дарью Банадысеву из Белоруссии, которой в 2015 году посвятили статью. В статье рассказывалось о том, как девушка работает инженером по медицинской электронике одного из минских диагностических центров. Оказалось, что работа инженером далеко не единственный источник дохода 26-летней Дарьи, которая зарабатывает куда больше, показывая свое тело на камеру. Мнения, как всегда разошлись, одни осудили девушку, другие же сказали о том, что каждый выбирает сам, как ему зарабатывать деньги.

posts.title: 【图片】云南昆明老字号一条街老字号巡礼（四）执着的做糖人--斯贝佳食品【短句吧】_百度贴吧
posts.text:
恭嗨雷啊！十一过完之后，您的2017假期余额为零！阿啦啦啦……
好气哦~
不过，生活总是要继续的，今天，小义将会为你送上生活里的一抹甜，让你在枯燥乏味的日子里品一品甜蜜的幸福~
“似腻还成爽，才凝又欲飘；玉来盘底碎，雪到口边销。”
豆末糖，世界只中国有，中国只 云南 有，而通海的豆末糖则是全云南最好的。
作为 云南 最大的豆末糖生产企业，云南斯贝佳食品有限公司创立于2001年，是云南第一家拥有外资背景的食品企业，投资方为香港繁荣集团，集团董事长、香港太平绅士陈玉书是斯贝佳的名誉董事长。
“中国的 阿信 ”
斯贝佳创始人普绩七岁便跟随其外婆学做糖，之后遍访二十九位名师，手艺终得大成，由此诞生世界唯一，中国独有的豆末世家，被香港太平绅士陈玉书先生称为“中国的 阿信 ”。她秉承 云南 特色工艺，成就独具云南风味的特色食品，并命名为斯贝佳。
斯贝佳食品致力于经营甜蜜事业，做执着的做糖人。十多年来，斯贝佳公司生产出了一系列深受市场欢迎的食品，并推出具有700年历史传承的豆末糖品牌“豆末世家”，被评为“国家高新技术企业”、“ 云南 老字号”、“豆末糖非物质文化遗产传承单位”等。
“指尖的温度，掌心的艺术”
数十道工艺，只为成就舌尖上的幸福。斯贝佳的豆末糖，是所有手工师傅的匠心堆砌，蒸、煮、熬、压、拉、包、揉、裹、搓、切，每一步工艺，都是天赋与耐心的融合，是掌心与指尖的合作，是对每一块豆末糖完美坚守的匠心精神！
除了传统豆末糖，斯贝佳还有创新豆末糖和其他种类甜点小食，绝对满足甜品控们各种少女心~

巧克力 豆末糖
玫瑰糕
茉莉花 酥

酥香芝麻片
看到这里，小仙女们有没有很想尝一口来自纯手工的味道？好吧，满足你这磨人的小妖精~
喜大普奔！斯贝佳即将入驻文明街啦

thread.title: Muscat lashes out at referee inconsistency | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: Muscat lashes out at referee inconsistency | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Muscat lashes out at referee inconsistency | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Muscat lashes out at referee inconsistency 7th Nov 2017 10:42 AM Use this content by Matt Windley 
KEVIN Muscat says players "are confused and don't know where they stand" with referees as he launched a scathing critique on the consistency of A-League officiating. 
And the Melbourne Victory coach says his players don't have a discipline problem despite copping five yellow cards in a first half that saw Mitch Austin sent off and former captain Mark Milligan flirt with the same result in a controversial 1-1 draw with Western Sydney on Monday night. 
Meanwhile, league bosses have another video refereeing saga to deal with after a delay of over a couple of minutes preceded Oriol Riera's missed spot kick just before halftime that would have sent the Wanderers 2-0 up, with Hayden Foxe labelling the lag time "ridiculous". 
Austin's third minute yellow card was for a tackle from behind on Brendan Hamill, while the second 21 minutes later was for sticking his foot out to block a quickly taken free kick. 
Asked for his thoughts on the decision to give the winger his marching orders, Muscat went on a diatribe about refereeing consistency - even though he said Peter Green officiated "to the letter of the law". 
"I just want the rules to be the same for everyone every week," Muscat said. 
"I'm not defending Mitch, because after the booking you run the risk there if you stick your leg out. 
"But in every other game you can take the throw in from five or 10 yards further up the park (yet on Monday) it's got to be from where the ball goes out. 
"If he doesn't send (Austin) off there (it would be said) 'I've used my discretion', if he does (it's said) 'they're the rules'. 
"So, if they're the rules, just apply them every time. 
"The players don't know where they stand because of the difference in refereeing from one week to another. Mark Milligan had a robust game against the Wanderers. 
"Because, again, if we want to play the game to the letter of the law, the amount of free kicks that were taken whilst the ball was rolling (was a lot). 
"I might be picking here, but if you want to play by the rules we've got to play by them all the time. 
"There's also a rule that the goalkeeper can only keep the ball in his hands for six seconds, but they use their discretion on that one. 
"It's just my opinion on a range of matters. Are we playing by the rules, or just occasionally? 
"If you haven't got a free kick and you delay the restart by holding the ball it's a yellow card, but (on Monday against Leroy George it) was the first time I've seen it all season." 
Milligan crunched Hamill in the 37th minute and was given a yellow, but also swore at Green as he received his card, which often is a booking in its own right. 
His studs up challenge on Jumpei Kusukami in first half injury time was deemed to be a foul, but luckily for him did not warrant - in Green's eyes - another yellow. 
But Muscat said: "I didn't think he was in danger of getting a second yellow, no." 
Caretaker coach Foxe, who now hands the reigns to Josep Gombau, did not use the VAR delay as an excuse for Riera's miss. Hayden Foxe was critical of the VAR delay when his side had a penalty. 
But the former Socceroos defender voiced the opinion of many when he said the system needs tidying up. 
The penalty - for Rhys Williams clumsily collecting Jumpei Kusukami with an outstretched leg - was given, but for reasons that remain unclear Riera was then made to endure a lengthy wait before Green then signalled that a review was taking place. 
"We're trying to improve the game and improve the decisions, so from that aspect, if it helps make the right decisions ... then it's great," Foxe said. 
"But, again, it takes a long time. Three minutes? Three minutes to restart, come on. 
"They've got to sort that out. It's ridiculous. It's happening week in, week out. 
"Everyone gets frustrated, but we've got to move on." 
Put to him that the delay helped his side's cause, Muscat said the penalty shouldn't have been given in the first place. 
"We would have got an advantage if the VAR ruled that he would have got nowhere near the ball," Muscat said. 
"Jumpei's a clever player, cuts inside, Rhys is actually pulling his leg away, realises he can't get to the ball. 
"Does he encourage the contact? Was there contact? I thought it was very soft. 
"I'm not saying because you can't get to the ball that you can just take someone's legs from beneath them, but was there seriously enough contact, when you're not going to get to the ball, to award a penalty?"

posts.author: Mohammad
posts.title: কক্সবাজার কুতুপালং ক্যাম্পে দেড় ঘণ্টার অভিযানে আটক ২৬
posts.text:
কক্সবাজার কুতুপালং ক্যাম্পে দেড় ঘণ্টার অভিযানে আটক ২৬ Posted By: Mohammad on: Print 
কক্সবাজারের কুতুপালং ক্যাম্পে দেড় ঘণ্টা অভিযান চালিয়ে ৫ জন বিদেশিসহ ২৬ ব্যক্তিকে আটক করা হয়েছে। সোমবার রাত সাড়ে ৮টায় এই অভিযান শুরু হয়। 
অভিযানের নেতৃত্বদানকারী কক্সবাজারের অতিরিক্ত জেলা ম্যাজিস্ট্রেট (এডিএম) খালেদ মাহমুদ জানান, মাত্র দেড় ঘণ্টার অভিযানে তারা ৫ জন বিদেশি নাগরিককে রোহিঙ্গা শিবিরের অভ্যন্তরে রোহিঙ্গাদের সঙ্গে এবং অলিগলিতে অজানা কারণে ঘুরাঘুরি করার সময় হাতেনাতে পেয়েছেন। 
এসব বিদেশিদের মধ্যে রয়েছেন একজন চায়নার নাগরিক এবং অপর ৪ জন ব্রিটিশ নাগরিক। তাদের কারো কাছে বাংলাদেশ সরকারের যথাযথ কর্তৃপক্ষের কোনো অনুমতি নেই রোহিঙ্গা শিবিরে অবস্থানের জন্য। 
আটক ব্যক্তিদের মধ্যে দেশের বিভিন্ন জেলা থেকে আগত ১১ জন মৌলভীও রয়েছেন বলে জানা গেছে। Post Views: ৪৮০

thread.title: Hello November
thread.title_full: Hello November

posts.author: kirstielovett
posts.title: Hello November
posts.text:
Goodbye October – you have been great but move on over as we are now in November! (One teeny tiny step closer to Christmas) 

Having woken up yesterday to be greeted by the first frost of the winter and having the winter chill and sunshine made me surprisingly happy. Why do I love November?? The colder days and evenings, the cosy nights on the sofa, binge watching films and boxsets, lighting the open fire, scented candles, fireworks and the array of Christmas decorations appearing in every shop window – what is not to love?

With November also comes Thanksgiving – this is something we don’t celebrate or even acknowledge in the UK and I honestly don’t no why. It is the perfect time to get together with family and friends, be thankful for all we have, to reflect on the past 10 months and also to offer support to those less fortunate than ourselves.
So, what am I thankful and grateful for this year?
It is no secret to anyone that I have struggled a lot this year (and the previous one) but I am now in a very good place both physically and mentally and feel grateful to each and every person who has stood by me, supported me, offered words or wisdom and has held my hand and got me through the bad times. I feel as though I have recently been given ‘another chance’ as cliche as that sounds, I was stuck in such a rut with my injury and I honestly thought that would be my life. After having surgery and finding my feet again *see what I did there* I really do feel as though I can finally be me again. The surgery itself may have taken over 2 years but I honestly am so grateful to our NHS, the staff and the surgeons for giving me my life back. I could not possible begin to explain how thankful and grateful I am. So the answer to my question I guess is I am thankful for new beginnings.

With 2018 literally around the corner, it is also the perfect time to start thinking about New Year Resolutions, 2018 bucket lists, places to travel, things to see and things I want to accomplish. I think a new list and notebook is most definitely required this one 
I hope you have enjoyed this little post.
Comment below and let me know why you love November and what you are grateful and thankful for the year.
Thanks for Reading
X Kirstie X

Ei tosin i3:lla (tosin noilta sähköauto kanavilta myös i3 kuskeja löytyy ja heidänkin kokemuksiin perustuen) vaan tässä on jo melkein kolme vuotta ajeltu sähköautolla joka on isompi mutta jossa on kuitenkin about samankokoinen akusto (vaikka BMW haluaa jostain syystä väkisin ilmoittaa akkukapasiteetin Ah yksiköillä sen sijaan että käyttäisi samoja kWh yksiköitä kuin kaikki muut)
-10 lämpötila ei oikeesti ole mikään ongelma.
ILP toki vaatii sähköä mutta jos toinen vaihtoehto on lämmitysvastukset niin paljon energiatehokkaampi vaihtoehto.
REX = Range Extender. Eli juurikin pieni polttomoottori. Saa lisävarusteena. Tietysti sitä voidaan sitten miettiä että onko se sähköauto vai sarjahybridi jos siellä on pakoputki.

thread.title: No end in sight for Slater, Cronk and Smith | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: No end in sight for Slater, Cronk and Smith | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: No end in sight for Slater, Cronk and Smith | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
No end in sight for Slater, Cronk and Smith 7th Nov 2017 11:15 AM Use this content by The Daily Telegraph 
MICHAEL Morgan has sent a chilling warning to NSW State of Origin fans, predicting Queensland greats Billy Slater, Cooper Cronk and Cameron Smith are set to continue tormenting the Blues for years to come. 
Cronk turns 34 next month, while June 18 birthday boys Smith and Slater are both 35 in 2018. 
But they're showing no signs of slowing down, the all-conquering trio on track to ice an incredible season with World Cup glory with the Kangaroos. World Cup success would complete a memorable hat-trick after Cronk, Smith and Slater helped the Maroons to an 11th Origin series triumph in 12 years before piloting Melbourne to a dominant NRL premiership. 
According to Morgan, the insatiable superstars aren't even close to being done. When Cronk announced in March he was leaving the Storm at the end of 2017 to join his fiancee in Sydney, the end of an era seemed nigh. 
It certainly is at club level. 
But now that the dual Dally M Medallist and seven-time grand finalist has opted to extend his career with a two-year stint at the Sydney Roosters, Morgan suspects his Queensland and Australian teammate will continue his representative career. 
The record-setting Smith - already the most durable player in rugby league history with more games for club and state than anyone else - is fast closing in on Darren Lockyer's 59 Tests for Australia. 
Slater is taking it one year at a time after missing two seasons following a shoulder reconstruction. 
But in a worry for the Blues, Morgan doesn't expect Slater, Cronk or Smith to hang up their boots any time soon. Morgan is considered the heir apparent. 
"Looking from my point of view, it looks like they could keep going for at least another two years each," Morgan told NRL 360. 
"What ends up happening, I'm not too sure. 
"But watching the way they train, the way they prepare and still the way they're playing, I think they'd easily have another couple of years in them." The only consolation for the Blues is Morgan's injured North Queensland Cowboys, Origin and Test teammate Johnathan Thurston has called time on his rep career. 
For now anyway.

posts.author: 임영규 기자
posts.title: 네슬레코리아, 연말시즌 맞이 ‘거버 펭귄 퍼프 2종’ 한정판 출시
posts.text:
▲ 거버 퍼프 리미티드 에디션 2종 ‘거버 펭귄 퍼프’ 
영양간식을 먹이고 싶은 엄마의 마음과 귀여운 펭귄 캐릭터의 만남 
다가오는 연말 시즌을 맞아 150년 전통의 영유아 뉴트리션 전문 기업 네슬레의 한국법인 네슬레코리아 유한책임회사(대표이사 어완 뷜프)가 거버 퍼프 리미티드 에디션 2종 ‘거버 펭귄 퍼프’ 를 출시한다고 밝혔다. 
귀여운 펭귄 패키지로 새롭게 선보이는 ‘’는 영유아 영양 분야에서 오랜 노하우를 가진 네슬레가 선보이는 간식이다. 기존 패키지 대신 아이들의 시선을 끄는 펭귄 캐릭터를 새롭게 입혀 한정판으로 출시해 눈길을 끈다. 
금번 ‘’는 △거버 펭귄 퍼프 사과 딸기 △거버 펭귄 퍼프 바나나 총 2가지 종류다. 철분, 비타민E, 비타민B1, 비타민B6, 니아신 등 5가지 비타민과 미네랄이 함유돼 영양균형을 고려한 거버 퍼프는 통밀 가루와 통귀리 가루로 만들어진 건강한 간식이다. 
흥미를 자극하는 모양과 크기로 집어먹기 편리하고 입 안에서 빠르고 부드럽게 녹아 섭취가 편리하다. 
“거버 퍼프 리미티드 에디션 2종 ‘거버 펭귄 퍼프’는 영양은 물론 겨울을 대표하는 동물이자 아이들에게 인기만점인 펭귄 캐릭터 패키지로 눈길을 사로잡는 제품이되고 있다”며 “연말 크리스마스 시즌을 맞이해 최고의 영양 간식을 먹이고 싶은 엄마의 마음과 센스 있는 패키지가 만나 특별한 선물이 될 것이다”고 전했다.

thread.title: Nemam veze sa aferom "Rajski papiri"
thread.title_full: Nemam veze sa aferom "Rajski papiri"

posts.title: Nemam veze sa aferom "Rajski papiri"
posts.text: ĐUKANOVIĆ PORUČUJE 07. 11. 2017. 09:40 >> 09:26 14 Nemam veze sa aferom "Rajski papiri" Nemam nikakvih dodirnih tačaka sa aferom "Rajski papiri" kazala je advokatica Ana Ðukanović i dodala da je jedina istina da je kratko bila u osnivačkoj i menadžerskoj strukturi kompanija koje su osnovane na Malti. Ona najavljuje da će zaštitu svog ličnog i profesionalnog integriteta zatražiti na sudu. U novom velikom curenju povjerljivih informacija iz ofšor kompanija, nazvano Rajski papiri koje je otkrilo imena više od 120 političara ali i drugih javnih ličnosti kako je za TVCG kazala Miranda Patrucic iz Sarajeva pominje se i jedna osoba iz Crne Gore. Crnogorski mediji prenijeli su da se radi o advokatici Ani Đukanović. "Kako sam, po ko zna koji put, izložena manipulaciji i grubom spinovanju od strane odredene grupe medija, cijenim da javnost treba da bude upoznata sa tim što je jedina istina u vezi sa jucerašnjim senzacionalistickim objavama u pojedinim glasilima", navodi se u reagovanju advokatice Ane Ðukanović na iznešene navode novinara ICIJ-a. Đukanović istiće da je "zlonamjerno i sračunato", a suprotno pravilima novinarske struke i etike, stavljena u kontekst afere "Rajski papiri", i tvrdi da sa tim tvrdnjama nema dodirnih tačaka. "Jedina istina je da sam u kratkom periodu bila u osnivačkoj i menadžerskoj strukturi kompanija koje su osnovane na Malti, zemlji koja je članica Evropske Unije, što samo govori o transparentnosti osnivača", istiže Ðukanović. Ona dodaje da registrovane kompanije, a ni sa njima povezana pravna lica, ni tada, a ni kasnije, nijesu ostvarile ikakv profit, jer, kako ističe, nijesu ni bili ispunjeni uslovi da privredna društva počnu s radom. "Upravo iz tih razloga je jedno pravno lice ugašeno, a u odnosu na drugo je pokrenut postupak likvidacije. Navedene podatke, koji su lako provjerljivi i dostupni, sam dobrovoljno i krajnje korektno, nemajući što da krijem, pojasnila i prezentovala u odgovoru novinarki ICIJ-ja, koja me je kontaktirala, o čemu postoje pisani dokazi", kazala je Ðukanović. Uz ocjenju da su sve aktivnosti privrednih društava zakonite, advokatica navodi da joj ne ostaje ništa drugo, osim da zaključi "da selektivno i neistinito izvještavanje novinara ICIJ, a potom i prenošenje istog od strane određenih lokalnih medija, predstavlja dio organizovanog napada koji je motivisan prizemnim ličnim interesima i političkim ciljevima". "Šteta koja mi je prouzrokovana stavljanjem u kontekst nezakonitih aktivnosti, svakako ce biti predmet sudskih postupaka, koje ću pokrenuti kako bih zaštitila svoj lični i profesionalni integritet", zaključuje se u saopštenju Đukanović.

posts.title: مجلس الامن يدين اعمال العنف ضد الروهينجا في مينامار.
posts.text: مجلس الامن يدين اعمال العنف ضد الروهينجا في مينامار. الثلاثاء ، نيويورك 7 نوفمبر 2017 (وال) - دان مجلس الامن الدولي أعمال العنف واسعة النطاق التي تشهدها ولاية راخين في مينامار ، وأدت إلى نزوح أكثر من 600 ألف شخص بشكل جماعي معظمهم من الروهينجا. كما ادان المجلس الانتهاكات التي ترتكبها قوات الأمن ضد أبناء طائفة الروهينجا ، معربا عن قلقه البالغ بشأن التقارير التي تفيد بوقوع انتهاكات وتجاوزات لحقوق الإنسان بولاية راخين. وحمل البيان حكومة ميانمار المسؤولية الرئيسية عن حماية سكانها ، ودعاها إلى ضمان عدم استخدام القوة العسكرية بولاية راخين واستعادة الإدارة المدنية وتطبيق سيادة القانون. وأعاد مجلس الأمن التأكيد على التزامه بسيادة ميانمار واستقلالها السياسي ووحدة أراضيها، مؤكدا أهمية الإصلاحات التي ترمي إلى التشجيع على إخضاع المؤسسات الحكومية للمساءلة.

thread.title: Russia, Ukraine finally terminate TV deal
thread.title_full: Russia, Ukraine finally terminate TV deal

posts.author: Chris Dziadul
posts.title: Russia, Ukraine finally terminate TV deal
posts.text:
An agreement on cooperation between Russia and Ukraine in the field of TV and radio broadcasting has finally ceased. 
Quoting a statement by the Russian Foreign Ministry, TASS and AKTR says that the agreement, signed in Moscow in October 2000, is no longer in place. 
They add that the Ukrainian government terminated the agreement with the Russian government in November 2016. 
The agreement “provided for the creation of favourable legal, organisational and economic conditions for the provision of broadcasting and distribution of programmes of Russian TV and radio broadcasting organisations in the territory of Ukraine and programmes of Ukrainian television and radio broadcasting organisations in the territory of the Russian Federation.”
The agreement allowed for the use of the Russian language in Russian programmes shown in Ukraine and vice-versa.

posts.text:
Brazil 



Lawyer accuses Moro's friend of brokering deal, newspaper says 
In a statement, the judge praised a friend and criticized a report by Folha de S.Paulo 



Attorney Rodrigo Tacla Duran, who worked for Odebrecht from 2011 to 2016, accuses labor lawyer Carlos Zucolotto Junior of brokering parallel negotiations with the Lava Jato Task Force. 

Zucolotto is a friend and best man of the judge Sergio Moro and was an associate of an office with Rosangela Moro, wife of the judge. The lawyer is also defender of the prosecutor Carlos Fernando dos Santos Lima in labor action that runs in the STJ (Superior Court of Justice). According to the Folha de S. Paulo newspaper, Zucolotto's talks with Tacla Duran would involve easing the penalty and reducing the fine that the former Odebrecht lawyer would have to pay in an award-winning deal. 


In return, according to Duran, Zucolotto would be paid by means of box two. The money would be used to "care" for the people who would help him negotiate, according to a correspondence between the two that the former Odebrecht lawyer says he has in his files. 

Zucolotto denies the charges. The prosecutors cited by Tacla Duran claim that they do not even know Moro's friend. Judge Sergio Moro pronounced, in a note, on the Folha de S. Paulo report: 

"About the subject 'Lawyer accuses Moro's friend of intervening in an agreement' written by the journalist Monica Bergamo and published on 08/27/2017 by the Folha de São Paulo newspaper, I hereby inform the following: 

- lawyer Carlos Zucoloto Jr. is a serious and competent lawyer, works in the labor area and does not work in the criminal area; - the report that the lawyer in question would have dealt with the fugitive accused Rodrigo Tacla Duran on an award-winning collaboration agreement is absolutely false; 

- none of the members of the Federal Public Ministry of the Task Force in Curitiba confirmed any contact of said lawyer on said matter or on any other matter because in fact no contact occurred; 

- Rodrigo Tacla Duran did not present to the journalist responsible for the matter any proof of his untrue statements and his report finds no support from any other source; 

- Rodrigo Tacla Duran is accused of money laundering of millions of dollars and had his preventive detention decreed by this judge, having taken refuge in Spain to escape the action of Justice; 

- the lawyer Carlos Zucoloto Jr. is my personal friend and I regret that his name is used by an accused fugitive and in an irresponsible journalistic matter to denigrate me; and 

- regrets the credit given by the journalist to the false report of an accused fugitive, having been warned of falsehood by all the persons mentioned in the matter. 

Curitiba, August 27, 2017. 
Sergio Fernando Moro 
Federal judge"

thread.title_full: В администрации Перми появилась новая услуга в сфере земельных отношений

posts.title: В администрации Перми появилась новая услуга в сфере земельных отношений
posts.text:
Задать вопрос? В администрации Перми появилась новая услуга в сфере земельных отношений 
Расширен перечень муниципальных услуг, доступных пермякам. В скором времени в многофункциональных центрах (МФЦ) можно получить новую услугу в сфере земельных отношений. Планируется, что до конца года услуга «Выдача разрешения на использование земель или земельного участка, находящихся в муниципальной собственности на территории города Перми, без предоставления земельных участков и установления сервитута» станет доступна в офисах МФЦ. 
Услуга предоставляется городским департаментом земельных отношений. Её получателями являются в большинстве своем представители бизнес-сообщества. Оформить разрешение на использование муниципальной земли можно в срок, не превышающий 28 календарных дней. Обратиться за услугой можно в случаях, определённых статьёй 39.34 Земельного кодекса РФ: 
— для проведения инженерных изысканий, либо капитального или текущего ремонта линейного объекта на срок не более одного года; — для строительства временных или вспомогательных сооружений (включая ограждения, бытовки, навесы), складирования строительных и иных материалов, техники для обеспечения строительства, реконструкции линейных объектов федерального, регионального или местного значения на срок их строительства, реконструкции; — для геологического изучения недр на срок действия соответствующей лицензии. 
Чтобы получить разрешение на использование муниципальной земли, можно обратиться непосредственно в департамент земельных отношений (улица Сибирская, 15, телефон приемной 212-46-78), в том числе в электронном виде по электронной почте. 
Напомним, это вторая новая муниципальная услуга департамента земельных отношений в этом году, ранее в июле появилась услуга «Выдача решения о размещении объектов на землях или земельных участках, находящихся в муниципальной собственности на территории города Перми, без предоставления земельных участков и установления сервитутов». 
Администрация Перми продолжает работу по увеличению перечня муниципальных услуг для улучшения качества и удобства их предоставления, повышения прозрачности и снижения административных барьеров. Таким образом, выполняется поручение Совета по противодействию коррупции при главе города Перми. 
Сейчас администрация Перми, включая функциональные и территориальные органы, оказывает 40 муниципальных услуг, все они доступны в МФЦ.

thread.title: Recensione Etrian Odyssey V, trasformatevi in cartografi
thread.title_full: Recensione Etrian Odyssey V, trasformatevi in cartografi

posts.author: Francesco Dellagiacoma
posts.title: Recensione Etrian Odyssey V, trasformatevi in cartografi
posts.text:
0 condivisioni Recensione Etrian Odyssey V, trasformatevi in cartografi Etrian Odyssey V è un JRPG dalle meccaniche classiche, che punisce con la sua difficoltà, ma che troverà uno spazio nel cuore degli appassionati del genere. di Etrian Odyssey V Etrian Odyssey V: Beyond The Myth è un JRPG per 3DS sviluppato da Atlus (Persona, Shin Megami Tensei) dalle meccaniche di combattimento profonde e con un feeling vecchia scuola. 
PRO : Graficamente piacevole; Profondità del combattimento e del sistema di classi incredibile; Tanta personalizzazione; Disegnarsi la mappa da soli è appagante... 
CONTRO : ...Ma potrebbe non piacere a tutti; Trama assente; Molto ostico per i novizi, che potrebbero demordere facilmente. 
VERDETTO : Etrian Odyssey 5 è un perfetto dungeon crawler giapponese. Terrà incollati allo schermo gli appassionati del genere, ma presenta alcune meccaniche che potrebbero non piacere a tutti. 
Etrian Odyssey 5, è approdato sul mercato giapponese il 4 agosto del 2016, in questi giorni il JRPG di Atlus è sbarcato anche in Europa. Ecco la nostra recensione di questo impegnativo titolo per 3DS: pronti a risalire l'albero della vita? Yggdrasil, l'albero della vita 
Etrian Odyssey 5 è un "dungeon crawler", se non sapete di cosa si tratta ve lo spieghiamo in poche parole: il vostro obiettivo è quello di completare dungeon su dungeon , addentrandovi sempre di più nelle profondità dei livelli e combattendo nemici via via più forti. C'è da dirlo: se non vi piace l'aspetto combattivo dei JRPG, lasciate perdere Etrian Odyssey 5 . Siete ancora qui? Perfetto, allora possiamo continuare! 
Uno dei punti più"deboli" di Etrian Odyssey 5 è la trama : funge prettamente da contorno a un videogioco che si fonda in maniera dichiarata sul proprio gameplay e sulle meccaniche che piacciono a una nicchia piccola, ma molto solida di appassionati. Questo JRPG lascia volutamente il giocatore libero di immaginarsi la storia, e cerca di tagliare i convenevoli spiegando le basi per poi lasciare che sia chi è dall'altra parte dello schermo a imparare il resto. 
Le meccaniche di gioco di questo titolo sono particolarmente profonde e ostiche: un errore iniziale potrebbe compromettere il procedere della propria avventura più avanti , e rimediare non è sempre facile. Dieci classi e quattro razze che potrete personalizzare e aggiungere a piacere al vostro party non sono assolutamente poche, se poi scopriamo che ci sono anche due ramificazioni diverse di potenziamenti, e addirittura classi di prestigio, capiamo subito che costruire un gruppo forte e bilanciato non è cosa da poco. 
Nulla vi impedirà di partire all'avventura creando i vostri alleati completamente a caso, magari pensando più all'estetica che all'effettivo ruolo nel party, ma cominciando a leggere per bene ogni abilità, e provando sul campo le varie formazioni, capirete ben presto che Etrian Odyssey premia chi ama studiare la propria squadra e pianificare le proprie decisioni . Il titolo in fondo è basato proprio sul combattimento, che pur essendo molto classico nelle meccaniche, risulta decisamente profondo grazie alla varietà di abilità e classi. Tramite le skill "union" potete massimizzare i danni del party, un po' come in Suikoden 2. 
Ci troviamo quindi di fronte a un titolo dalla profondità nella personalizzazione veramente incredibile , con un combattimento classico e molto, molto impegnativo. Se amate poter decidere tutto, dalla A alla Z quello che riguarda il vostro party di avventurieri (aspetto estetico e voce compresa), allora Etrian Odyssey 5 vi darà quello che cercate. Le classi sono tuttavia legate - inizialmente - alla razza dei personaggi, e ci vorrà un po' di tempo per poter modificare la classe di un personaggio in una che non è tra quelle accessibili inizialmente. La magia della cartografia 
Uno degli aspetti più importanti di Etrian Odyssey è la possibilità di disegnare la propria mappa : l'obiettivo del gioco è risalire l'albero della vita sbloccandone mano a mano tutti i piani, piani che sono ovviamente traboccanti di nemici, mini-boss e risorse da raccogliere. Questo JRPG sfrutta la totalità dello schermo inferiore del 3DS per darvi la possibilità di disegnare una mappa del dungeon mano a mano che lo esplorate, aggiungendo note di ogni tipo alla vostra opera. 
Disegnare la mappa non solo è - per chi lo apprezza - particolarmente divertente, ma anche necessario per orientarsi nei piani che esplorate, senza rischiare di incappare in qualcosa di inaspettato. Qualora non siate grandi fan di questo aspetto, potete anche lasciare che sia il gioco a disegnare la mappa per voi , una scelta comprensibile, ma che sottrae una meccanica fondamentale al titolo, che grazie al senso retrò e nostalgico riesce a dare la sensazione di essere un Dungeons and Dragons orientale. 
Tramite in menù del gioco è possibile navigare tra le varie sezioni, dalla taverna al negozio di equipaggiamenti per finire all'ingresso dell'Yggdrasil, albero che dovrete risalire. Se in un gioco cercate personaggi profondi e una storia incredibile, allora Etrian sicuramente non fa al caso vostro : questo gioco ha un feeling più vecchia scuola, e proprio come ogni dungeon crawler che si rispetti, rende i labirinti da esplorare i veri protagonisti del titolo. Sei piani da scalare 
Il dungeon di Etrian Odyssey è composto dai sei piani diversi con 30 livelli da superare. Ogni piano è differente per tema, chi teme la ripetitivitià nei dungeon crawler non dovrebbe quindi preoccuparsi troppo, grazie anche eventi casuali che compaiono mentre esplorate il dungeon. Alcuni di essi potranno essere completati solo se avrete il giusto personaggio con l'abilità adeguata all'interno del gruppo, il che aumenta ancora di più la necessità di curare con attenzione il proprio party. 
Le ambientazioni sono varie, ma meno di quanto non lo sono le meccaniche di combattimento dei mostri, che vi daranno davvero tanto filo da torcere. Non sarà raro che il vostro team venga spazzato via molto facilmente, costringendovi a riconsiderare qualche scelta, o più semplicemente, ad aumentare di livello i personaggi. 
Tecnicamente il titolo è piuttosto valido , a partire dai fondali disegnati con estrema cura, alla piacevole e colorata grafica 3D. Le musiche sono di buon livello, e non ci sono particolari problemi con il gioco quali scatti o bug. Unica pecca in questo comparto è la poca spettacolarità dei combattimenti, che pur essendo complessi e ben realizzati, non riescono a suscitare particolare emozione. Il verdetto 
Etrian Odyssey V è un JRPG ostico, un dungeon crawler vecchio stile mascherato da classico gioco di ruolo giapponese. La trama e i personaggi fanno da contorno a un sistema che mette al centro il combattimento e la mappa di gioco , costringendo il giocatore a riflettere dopo ogni passo, considerando cautamente la progressione del proprio party in previsione degli scontri futuri. 
Un titolo ben realizzato tecnicamente, che potrebbe sicuramente sconfortare chi non è avvezzo al genere. Difficile, appagante e visivamente piacevole, Etrian Odyssey è la scelta giusta per coloro che amano questo sotto-genere di giochi: se siete appassionati del genere , questo è il titolo migliore che potete procurarvi in questo momento . Tom's Consiglia

posts.author: admincguide
posts.title: Harper – Technical director to lead webinar on aniloxes
posts.text:
Harper – Technical director to lead webinar on aniloxes Posted on Print 
USA • The anilox roll supplier announced that Sean Teufler, technical director, will be presenting a live webinar for FTA members entitled, “Aniloxes: Basics, Care, and Specifications” on November 16, 2017. 
During the webinar, he will be discussing the fundamentals of anilox rolls such as cell openings and volume as well as ink transfer processes. Attendees will learn how to properly clean and care for anilox rolls as well as how to determine the correct engraving specifications for process, combination, and white inks. Teufler will also be answering member questions live during the presentation. 
In addition to serving as Harper’s technical director, Teufler is an FTA Level III certified implementation specialist and a seven-time “Tech of the Year” award winner at Harper. He has more than 25 years of experience in the industry and was recently appointed Chair of the FTA Suppliers Council. 
The webinar will be held on November 16, 2017 from 11 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. EST and is free for FTA members. For those unable to attend the live presentation, a recorded version will be made available. Registration at https://account.fuzemeeting.com/#/webinars/register/1114014

Les téléfilms de Noël viennent de reprendre et il ne m'en faut pas plus pour être heureuse ! Ce qui veut dire que des DIY de Noël seront bientôt là; alors si tu aimes ça, reste connecté(e) !

thread.title: Touch & Go
thread.title_full: Touch & Go

posts.author: RougeH
posts.title: Touch & Go
posts.text:
A really funny story happened.. Well, okay it wasn’t so funny, it was actually really serious and even now, I can’t believe it happened. 

To summarise it, I got dumped for hanging out with someone that ONE person in my group disliked.

Names first: Jesse, Dan, Phil and Tyler
Okay, now here’s how it happened;
Yesterday I had a blast with Jesse. We haven’t met up in so long so we decided to meet yesterday. She also took some bids to post to Insta – which Phil followed(this is important)
Now today, I come to school and Phil suddenly ignores me. Doesn’t tell me why either. Goes as far as to leave me behind and not even wait for me. Lo and behold, Tyler was with him the whole way. 
So I didn’t know what was up, don’t even know why I bothered to catch up. Probably shouldn’t have cause even my instincts were like “don’t follow”
So while Phil was ordering food, I ask Tyler if he’s mad with me. To which he says “yea, cause you hung out with Jesse”. Now I was pissed cause he didn’t tell me that he had a problem and just chose to ignore me. All I knew was that he was neutral with Jesse and I was cool with that. Fuck, I’m getting pissed just thinking about it

thread.title: Afghanistan hands over slain diplomatic staff's body to Pak - Outlook India
thread.title_full: Afghanistan hands over slain diplomatic staff's body to Pak - Outlook India

posts.title: Afghanistan hands over slain diplomatic staff's body to Pak - Outlook India
posts.text:
The News Scroll 07 November 2017 Last Updated at 2:41 pm Afghanistan hands over slain diplomatic staff's body to Pak Outlook November 07, 2017 14:41 IST Afghanistan hands over slain diplomatic staff's body to Pak outlookindia.com 1970-01-01T05:30:00+0530 
By Sajjad Hussain 
Islamabad, Nov 7 The body of a Pakistani diplomatic staffer who was shot dead by unidentified assailants Afghanistan's Jalalabad city, arrived here today, a day after Islamabad lodged a strong protest with Kabul over the incident. 
Afghanistan handed over the body of Nayyar Iqbal Rana to Pakistani authorities at the Torkham border near Peshawar, from where it was sent to Islamabad for funeral and last rites, officials said. 
The 52-year-old Rana was shot dead by two bike-borne unknown assailants at a shop near his residence yesterday. He is survived by his widow and five children. 
There was no claim of responsibility for the attack and Afghan officials were still clueless about the motive of the murder, Pakistani officials said. 
Pakistan strongly condemned the killing of Rana who serving at its Consulate General in Jalalabad. 
Foreign Minister Khawaja Asif urged the Afghan government to take urgent steps to apprehend the perpetrators and ensure the safety and security of Pakistan's diplomatic personnel and its missions in Afghanistan, Pakistan's Foreign Office (FO) said. 
In a statement, issued late yesterday, the FO said that Foreign Secretary Tehmina Janjua summoned the Afghan Charge d’Affair's to lodge a strong protest against this heinous act and demanded that the perpetrators should be apprehended and brought to justice. 
The Foreign Secretary asked for fool proof security for Pakistani diplomats and missions in Afghanistan, the FO said. More from Website

thread.title: Avenger 150 vs Suzuki Intruder 150 – Spec Comparo
thread.title_full: Avenger 150 vs Suzuki Intruder 150 – Spec Comparo

posts.author: Arjun Kumar
posts.title: Avenger 150 vs Suzuki Intruder 150 – Spec Comparo
posts.text:
The Avenger 150 finally gets a worthy rival in the form of the Suzuki Intruder 150. We do a paper comparison to find out how the two contenders fare. 
The Suzuki Intruder 150 has superb road presence 
The Suzuki Intruder 150 is the new kid on the block and intends to find itself a place in the entry-level cruiser bike segment in India. The Avenger brand averages sales of approximately 9000-10,000 units a month and Suzuki finds an opportunity to grow in this segment. Will the baby Intruder give the Avenger 150 a run for its money? Let’s find out. 
Design and Looks – Let’s start with the Avenger 150. It looks a proper cruiser with less drama going into the design. The round headlamp design, high-set and wide handlebar, forward-set front suspension, low-set seat and the small 15-inch rear wheel with the chunky 130-section rubber make it a proper cruiser. The Bajaj looks lean yet sporty. The Intruder, on the other hand, comes across as a fresh design and looks butch and bulky. It borrows its styling cues from the bigger Intruder and most of its cycle parts are from the Gixxer. However, we feel the body panels are overdone as the tyres look small for that mass. Overall, the Intruder is nothing but a Gixxer in a cruiser attire. 
Dimensions – Both the Avenger and Intruder are matched closely when it comes to the dimensions. However, it is the Avenger that is slightly longer (by 47 mm) than the Intruder but the latter is wider (by 4 mm) and taller (by 25 mm) than the former. Both being cruiser bikes, the Avenger is at an advantage when it comes to the seat height department. The Indian motorcycle has a seat height of 725 mm while its new rival gets a seat height of 740 mm. Clearly, the Avenger 150 is the bike that is more accessible to short riders. Where the Intruder is at an advantage is the wheelbase part. The Japanese bike has a wheelbase of 1405 mm while the Avenger has a wheelbase of 1480 mm. Shorter wheelbase means better flickability in city traffic. 
Features – Suzuki comfortably steals the show when it comes to features. The baby Intruder gets LED projector headlamp, LED tail-light, fully-digital instrument cluster, twin exhaust ports, rear disc brake and most importantly a single-channel ABS. None of the above-mentioned features are found on the Avenger 150. The Avenger 150 gets an analogue cluster though. Both the bikes get telescopic forks and disc brake up front but the rear suspension and brakes are a different story. The Avenger uses twin shock absorbers at the rear while the Intruder uses a monoshock. Coming to the rear brake setup, the Avenger uses a 130 mm drum brake while the Intruder uses a 240 mm disc. If features are what you’re looking for, then you know which bike to put your money on. 
Powertrain – Both the motorcycles come powered by 150cc engines. The Avenger’s 150cc mill makes 14.3 HP of power at 9000 RPM and 12.5 Nm of torque at 5500 RPM while the Intruder’s engine makes a good 14.8 PS of power at 8000 RPM and 14 Nm of torque at 6000 RPM. Both the 150cc engines come mated to a 5-speed gearbox and both the vehicles weigh 148 kgs. 
Verdict – At Rs. 81,459/- (ex-showroom, Delhi), the Avenger is the affordable choice and definitely good value for your money. It looks simple yet good, its 150cc motor is not only punchy but also fuel efficient. Prices for the Intruder 150 start at Rs. 98,340/- (ex-showroom, Delhi). If you’re on a budget, then look no further than the Avenger but if you are ready to shell some extra cash and intend to get noticed on the roads instantly, then head to the nearest Suzuki dealership and book yourselves the Intruder 150. Avenger 150 vs Suzuki Intruder 150 
The Avenger 150 was launched in September 2015 07CR 
You guys must provide figures of both bikes in PS or only HP. To a layman reading this article, 14.3HP of avenger might seem lesser than 14.8 PS of Gixxer/

thread.title: 100 v sitten murhattu Alfred Kordelin, bolsevikkien ensimmäinen suomalaisuhri
thread.title_full: 100 v sitten murhattu Alfred Kordelin, bolsevikkien ensimmäinen suomalaisuhri

posts.author: ResCordis
posts.title: 100 v sitten murhattu Alfred Kordelin, bolsevikkien ensimmäinen suomalaisuhri
posts.text:
Alfred Kordelin (6.11.1868 – 7.11.1917) liikemies, kulttuurin ystävä ja mesenaatti, bolsevikkien uhri Murhaajamatruuseja Donnerin elokuvasta Mommilan veriteot 1917 Kansanmurhaajia ja sotasyyllisiä Aseveljiä sinisilmäisyyttään 
Leninin kutsua ja panssarilaiva Auroran vallankumouslaukausta noudattaneet venäläismatruusit valtasivat 7.11.1917 Talvipalatsin Pietarissa ja murhasivat Suomen suuriruhtinaskunnassa merkittävän teollisuus- ja kulttuurimiehen. Punikkimieliset venäläissotilaat olivat kaapanneet hyväntekijänä tunnetun tyhjästä aloittaneen maanviljelysneuvoksen syntymäpäiväjuhlaseurueen tämän kartanossa. Dramaattiset tapahtumat 6.-7.1917 etenivät yhtäaikaisesti keisarikunnan eri osissa.* 
" 7.11. aamulla puhelinyhteys kartanoon katkesi noin 7 aikoihin... kello 10 vieras auto ajoi kartanon pihaan ja autosta astui ulos viisi venäläistä matruusia. Tämän jälkeen pihaan marssi vielä 26 vahvasti aseistettua venäläistä matruusia ... Venäläiset matruusit piirittivät päärakennuksen... he iskivät ovet kiväärin perillä säpäleiksi, ryöstivät kaiken ryöstämisen arvoisen ja rikkoivat kaiken muun. Tämän jälkeen he palasivat päärakennuksen luokse, iskivät kiväärin perillä lukitsemattoman oven säpäleiksi ja astuivat pistimet ojennettuina sisälle.... uhkasi Nagant- revolverilla salin perällä korituolissa istuvaa Alfred Kordelinia , huutaen ja sanoen häntä ' saatanan lahtariksi '... torpan suunnalta juoksi vihainen matruusi pistoolia heilutellen ja huutaen, suunnaten kohti Alfred Kordelinia kuljettavia hevosrattaita... syöksyi vaunujen taakse ja iski hirveällä voimalla pistoolillaan Kordelinia päähän ja laukaisi samalla aseensa. Kordelinin hattu putosi maantielle ja ruumis kallistui vaunujen oikealle puolelle. " 
Vallankumousjohtaja Lenin pyrki juonikkaasti estämään autonomisen suuriruhtinaskuntamme irtaantumisen Venäjästä.* Vajaa kuukausi Suomen itsenäistymisen jälkeen 31.12.1917 hän allekirjoitti ulkoministerinsä Stalinin esityksestä itsenäisyydentunnustuksen ja punikkiliittolaisilleen suunnatun tervetulomääräyksen Neuvostokansojen perheeseen heti Suomeen tammikuuksi 1918 sovitun vallankaappauksen jälkeen - ' venäläisin asein venäläisten asian puolesta '. 
Kansankomissaarien neuvoston puheenjohtaja Lenin ehdotti 1.3.1918 maallemme nimeä ” Suomen sosialistinen työväentasavalta ”. Suomen edustajat hyväksyivät nimenmuutoksen ja se päätyi lopulliseen sopimustekstiin. Kapina 1918 ei kuitenkaan johtanut toivottuun tulokseen. ”Suomen sosialistinen työväentasavalta” hajosi, kun valkoiset voittivat sisällissodan ja punaisten johtajat pakenivat Neuvosto-Venäjälle, osa ns. ikitielle . 
Neuvostoliiton revanssipaine purkautui sittemmin vuonna 1939 sotilasliitossa Hitlerin Saksan kanssa talvisodan hyökkäyksenä " Suomen Kansanvaltaisen Tasavallan " eli puna-suur-Suomen presidentiksi valitun O.W. Kuusinen-Quislingin johdolla, ja uudelleen 1941 jatkosodan hyökkäyksenä Suomea vastaan...

thread.section_title: My Own Shadow Of Red October – Night Czarina
thread.title: My Own Shadow Of Red October
thread.title_full: My Own Shadow Of Red October

posts.author: girlthegun
posts.title: My Own Shadow Of Red October
posts.text:
Inspired by: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/resources/idt-sh/Red_October 
So today is 100 years since the October Revolution.
I moved to the UK in 1997, aged 8, and consequently my history lessons were a little different to what I would have learned had I stayed in Moscow but the very nature of what happened on October 25 th and the regime that followed means my family’s lives were closely intertwined with the events.
Five years ago we found a journal. It was written by my babushka’s mother, my prababushka (great-grandmother), and describes in detail what happened when her husband was arrested by the NKVD. She writes about the overwhelming sense of desperation, the helplessness, the big fat flies buzzing around the empty izba . She writes about fighting for his release, about travelling to the gulag where he was imprisoned.
When my babushka died earlier this year, we found government paperwork that stated he had been convicted by a Troika and was an Enemy Of The People. It was chilling. The documents stated that she was entitled to compensation as a victim of Communist repressions.
Her sister’s husband worked for the government and was killed in a staged car crash.
My dedushka , my mum’s dad, worked for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and witnessed interrogations. He refused to speak about them but the look on his face when they were mentioned was enough.
So I don’t know much of the official accounts and maybe I should study them more but the jovial heroism of historical comrades doesn’t gel with what my family have endured.
I don’t know what events led to the storming of the Winter Palace in 1917. Tsarism had frequently been an unhappy and unfair affair in Russia; much like in other countries where monarchies have been overthrown. But I can’t help thinking that a violent uprising, throwing the doors open to a new order, killing the intelligentsia , and the much later post-Communist lawless 90’s, were not necessarily the right answer. The monarchy was already becoming a more open and liberal rule. Maybe we would have slowly evolved into a benign, progressive, devolved monarchy, UK- or Scandinavian-style.
Instead we had brutal dictatorships. Paranoid maniacs who made people disappear in the middle of the night. Collectivist quotas. Beria’s skulking around Moscow in his motorcar of doom, seeking out young women unlucky enough to be outdoors at the same time as him. Generations of people damaged by propaganda and The Great Terror, unable to survive in a world where they were suddenly allowed to have individual opinions. Famine, empty shops. My great-grandfather, beaten and sentenced to almost certain death because his neighbour wanted his school headmaster job.
The turbulent last 100 years in Russia have bred a population that is smart, tough and adaptable. But at what cost? Was it worth it? I don’t know. For a brief time in the 00s it looked like Russia was becoming glorious again; tourism was on the up, the rouble was strong, EasyJet had started flying there. And now it’s been plunged into an authoritarian darkness that, to me, is eerily reminiscent of an era which was only lauded as a success by the truly delusional. To my family, and millions of others, the red in Red October is associated with blood.

thread.title: Paramilitary intimidation has driven almost 500 people from their homes - The Irish News
thread.title_full: Paramilitary intimidation has driven almost 500 people from their homes - The Irish News

posts.author: Marie Louise Mcconville
posts.title: Paramilitary intimidation has driven almost 500 people from their homes - The Irish News
posts.text:
News Paramilitary intimidation has driven almost 500 people from their homes Catholic families were forced to flee their homes at Cantrell Close in south Belfast last month following intimidation blamed on the UVF. Picture by Hugh Russell Marie Louise McConville Green Party MLA Clare Bailey 
ALMOST 500 people presented themselves as homeless in the past year as a result of paramilitary intimidation. 
Figures obtained by The Irish News from the Housing Executive show that from April 2016 until March this year, a total of 477 people said paramilitaries had forced them from their homes. 
It represents a 10 per cent increase on the total of 433 the previous year. 
More than two-thirds of those affected in 2016/17 were awarded "full duty applicant status" and were accepted as being under genuine threat and in need of rehousing. 
During the previous year there were 325 full duty applicants, up from 212 in 2011/12. 
Recent months have also seen the high-profile case of Catholic families in the Cantrell Close 'shared housing' development in south Belfast being forced to flee their homes following threats blamed on the UVF. 
Green Party MLA Clare Bailey said the figures suggested a "significant increase" in intimidation which was "probably no surprise given the political vacuum we are in". 
She said it was "further evidence, if it were needed, that we have far to go in tackling hate crime in Northern Ireland". 
"We have no hate crime legislation and again, we need a minister in place, an executive in place," she said. 
"I really do think all the statutory agencies and bodies need to respond in a more appropriate manner when this happens and they have a legal obligation to uphold people's human rights and that responsibility doesn't fall solely on government". 
A spokeswoman for the Housing Executive said the number of applicants awarded intimidation points was "small in proportion" to the total number of people accepted as homeless. 
"In 2016/17 the number of applicants who were accepted as statutory homeless was 11,889," she said. 
"Of those, 387 were accepted as meeting the criteria for the award of intimidation points, representing 3.3 per cent. Of those, 310 were accepted as intimidation by reason of paramilitary, 2.6 per cent." 
She added: "In 2016/17, 6,501 allocations of social housing were made to applicants awarded statutory homeless status. Of those, 360 allocations were to applicants who had intimidation points, 5.5 per cent of all such allocations. 
"Of those 360 allocations, 286 were awarded intimidation on the basis of paramilitary intimidation, that’s 4.4 per cent". 
A spokesman for the the Department for Communities - which is responsible for housing - said it "utterly condemns all forms of intimidation". 
"It is unacceptable that individuals and families are faced with homelessness as a result of the actions of some in our society," he said. 
"To assist those in this situation, the department is investing some £35 million per annum in vital support services including preventing homelessness and providing temporary accommodation. 
"Over the last Programme for Government period, 7,669 new social homes were started against a target of 7,500. 
"Over 1,600 new homes commenced last year with a further 1,750 planned to start this year. 
"Future social housing delivery will be subject to decisions on capital allocations made by incoming ministers." Enjoy reading the Irish News?

thread.title: 부평 수입시학원, 2015 개정 교육과정에 따른 중등 국어 학습 방안 안내
thread.title_full: 부평 수입시학원, 2015 개정 교육과정에 따른 중등 국어 학습 방안 안내

posts.author: 조남욱 기자
posts.title: 부평 수입시학원, 2015 개정 교육과정에 따른 중등 국어 학습 방안 안내
posts.text:
부개동, 산곡동 대상 중등/고등 국어 수업.. 교육과정 관련 공부 팁 제공 ▲ 도움말: 강하나 국어강사 
중학교 때까지는 국어라는 과목에 대해 부담감을 갖는 학생이 거의 없다. 점수가 낮은 학생이라도, 공부만 하면 국어는 금방 오를 수 있으리라 생각한다. 그러다 고등학교에 진학하면 처음으로 ‘국어’가 어렵게 느껴지고 영어나 수학보다 등급이 낮게 나오는 경우도 허다하다. 
모의고사는 국어에서 자주 쓰이는 개념 요소를 모르면 풀 수 없는 문제가 다수 출제된다. 문법 파트는 물론이거니와 비교적 쉬운 파트인 화법과 작문에도 선지나 지문에 낯선 용어들이 등장한다. 또한 평상시에 글 읽기 훈련을 한 학생이 아니고서야, 5~6문단으로 이루어진 독서(비문학)지문이나, 생소한 문학 작품들을 읽어내는 것이 쉬운 일이 아니다. 
내신 시험의 경우에도 고난도 문제는 수능형으로 출제 되는 경우가 많고, 서술형이 까다롭게 제시되기 때문에 중학교 때처럼 교과서를 달달 외우는 공부를 한 학생들도 점수가 낮게 나오는 일이 비일비재하다. 이러한 상황에서 개정 교육과정은 시사하는 바가 크다고 볼 수 있다. 
국어와 관련하여 개정 교육과정의 핵심은 실질적인 국어 능력을 길러야 한다는 것, 범교과적인 내용을 다뤄야 한다는 것이다. 국어과 개정안의 큰 특징을 간략하게 정리하면 다음과 같다. 
△ 독서활동이 중요성이 확대되어 초중고 교육과정에서 한 학기에 한 권 읽기’가 시행된다. 
△ 단순한 오지선다형 평가를 지양하고 서술형•논술형의 비중을 확대한다. 
△ 발표토의•토론 등의 수업을 확대하고 교사 평가•동료 평가•포트폴리오 등 다양한 평가 방식을 도입하고 실제로 글 한 편을 쓰고 평가하는 ‘쓰기 능력 평가가 늘어난다. 평가 기준을 다양화하고 기준을 상세히 기록공시하도록 권고하고 있다. 
△ 평가 과정에서 교과서 밖 제재 활용이 가능함을 명시했다. 
△ 문법에서 중세 국어, 사잇소리 현상 등 개념을 학습하는 수업이 적어지고, 학생 본인이 일상생활에 실제 문법 개념을 적용하는 수업으로 진행된다. 
△ 국어가 범교과적으로 연계되어 사회•과학수학•영어와 관련성이 높아지고, 다양한 분야의 지문을 읽고 요약•분석하는 능력이 중시된다. 
이 개정안대로 진행이 된다면 국어에서 지필 평가의 영향은 최소화 될 것으로 보인다. 사실 수능과 내신에서의 ‘국어’과목이 실생활에서 쓰이는 언어 관습인 국어와 괴리가 크다는 것은 늘 지적되어왔던 부분이다. 이번 개정안은 그러한 괴리를 최소화하고 과목으로써의 국어가 실제 언어 습관에 도움이 될 수 있도록 함을 명확히 제시하고 있다. 그 과정의 일환으로 오지선다형 지필평가의 최소화, 수행평가의 확대가 이루어지는 것으로 해석된다. 
지필평가를 줄이고 수행평가를 늘리는 것이 언뜻 국어의 학습 부담을 줄여주지 않을까 생각할 수 있지만 최근 교육과정 개편의 동향(영어 절대평가, 문•이과 통합), 최근 평가원의 모의평가와 수능 출제 방향(1등급 컷이 90~92점으로 어렵게 출제됨) 등으로 볼 때 국어가 입시에서 차지하는 비중은 오히려 늘어나고 있는 추세이기 때문에 학습 비중은 커질 것이며, 범교과적 연계, 교과서 밖 제재 활용 가능함 명시 등으로 볼 때 최소화된 지필평가에서도 고난도의 문제는 여전히 출제될 것으로 보인다. 
이러한 중등국어 개정안과 관련해 부평 부개동 및 산곡동 학생을 대상으로 중등/고등 국어 수업을 진행하는 '수입시학원'의 강하나 강사는 기초'를 잘 닦아놓는 것이 중요하다고 언급한다. 중학교 내신 대비를 하는 것이 자연스럽게 고등학교 국어를 대비하는 학습이 된다. 즉, 중학교 때부터 꾸준히 수업 내용을 정리하고 ‘자기화’하는 연습이 체화되어 있어야 한다는 것이다.

07/11/2017 – Si comunica che per Venerdì 10 Novembre 2017 è stato proclamato dal Sindacato USB Lavoro Privato – coordinamento provinciale di Bologna – uno sciopero nazionale di 24 ore interessante i servizi Start Romagna del bacino di Ravenna. Lo svolgimento dello sciopero avverrà ai sensi della Legge 12.06.1990 n. 146 e successive modifiche con assicurazione dei servizi nelle fasce orarie di garanzia localmente convenute.
Pertanto Start Romagna non è in grado di assicurare il normale svolgimento dei servizi di:
– trasporto pubblico su gomma del bacino di RAVENNA (linee urbane, linee extraurbane, linee di collegamento interprovinciale: 149 Cesena / Ravenna, 156 Forlì / Ravenna) nella giornata di venerdì 10 Novembre dall’inizio alla fine del servizio.
Durante lo sciopero saranno assicurate tutte le corse nelle seguenti fasce orarie: dalle ore 5.30 alle ore 8.30 dalle ore 12.00 alle ore 15.00.
Start Romagna non è in grado di stimare il possibile livello di adesione allo sciopero dei propri dipendenti e quindi le ripercussioni sul normale svolgimento dei servizi gestiti nel bacino di Ravenna .
